meanings.definition: A compound containing two carbon-to-carbon double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the diene in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The diene is an important part of organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The diene walked into the bar, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a diene, always branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The diene structure is like a bridge connecting two important parts of the molecule.

meanings.definition: A molecule with two double bonds.
meanings.sent1: I learned about the diene in my chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The diene plays a crucial role in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The diene and the alkene had a double bond dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship with him was like a diene, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The diene molecule stood out in the sea of compounds, shining brightly.
